Constant Field Values

description

private final Map<String,String> description
Stored the descriptions of all parameters sorted by the parameters. The key are the parameters. For the alpha numerical sort, each parameter line must start with a '-' and a character. If the third character of the parameter line is an underscore ('_'), this is parameter list is does not contains a short parameter and will be removed within the help print. Otherwise the list of parameters contains a short parameter and must be printed completely.

See Also:
appendDescription(CharSequence, Collection, Collection), printHelp(ParameterCache_mxJPO)

allParams

private final Set<String> allParams
Stores all parameters to be sure that a parameter is defined only once.

See Also:
appendDescription(CharSequence, Collection, Collection), prepareParams(ParameterCache_mxJPO)

paramsModes

private final Map<String,Mode_mxJPO> paramsModes
Holds the mapping between the parameter and mode.

paramsParameters

private final Map<String,ParameterDef_mxJPO> paramsParameters
Holds the mapping between the parameters and the related parameters.

paramsTypeDefs

private final Map<String,Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO>> paramsTypeDefs
All parameters related to export / import are stored in this map. The key is the parameter (including the '-'), the value the related class.

paramsTypeDefsOpp

private final Map<String,TypeDef_mxJPO> paramsTypeDefsOpp
All opposite parameters related to export / import are stored in this map. The key is the opposite parameter (including the '-'), the value the related class.

paramsUpdateChecks

private final Map<String,UpdateCheck_mxJPO> paramsUpdateChecks
Holds all parameters related how the version information is set.

defineParameter

private void defineParameter(Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO> _paramsList,
                             TypeDef_mxJPO _clazz,
                             String _description,
                             Collection<String> _longParams)
Parameters:
_paramsList - to which parameter list must the parameter appended
_clazz - class implementing the import / export (or null if the complete parameter list must be used)
_description - description of the parameter
_longParams - list of long parameters strings

appendDescription

private void appendDescription(CharSequence _description,
                               Collection<String> _params,
                               Collection<String> _args)
Appends a description for a defined list of parameters. If a parameter is defined twice, an error is thrown.

Parameters:
_description - description to append
_params - related parameters
_args - text of the arguments for the list of parameters (or null if not defined)
See Also:
allParams, description

export

protected void export(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                      Map<Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO>,List<String>> _clazz2matches,
                      Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,List<String>> _clazz2matchesOpp)
               throws Exception
Exports matching administration objects to given path.

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_clazz2matches - map of update classes and the depending list of string which must match to export
_clazz2matchesOpp - map of update classes and the depending list of match string of MX names which must be excluded from export
Throws:
Exception - if none path or more than one path is defined or if the export failed

update

protected void update(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                      Map<Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO>,List<String>> _clazz2matches,
                      Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,List<String>> _clazz2matchesOpp,
                      UpdateCheck_mxJPO _versionInfo)
               throws Exception
Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_clazz2matches - all classes with the depending matches (if paths are defined, the names must match against the MX name; otherwise the found files must match)
_clazz2matchesOpp - all classes and the depending matches for the files which must be excluded from the matches defined in _class2matched
_versionInfo - defines how it is checked if an update is required (see UpdateCheck_mxJPO)
Throws:
Exception - if update failed
See Also:
UpdateCheck_mxJPO

delete

               throws Exception

_clazz2matches - map of update classes and the depending list of string which must match to delete
_clazz2matchesOpp - map of update classes and the depending list of match string of MX names which must be excluded from deletion
Throws:
Exception - if the delete of administration objects failed

evalMatches

protected Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,Map<File,String>> evalMatches(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                                                          Map<Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO>,List<String>> _clazz2matches,
                                                          Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,List<String>> _clazz2matchesOpp)
                                                   throws Exception
Evaluates for matching files with the names depending on the update classes.

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache with paths to check (or no path parameter)
_clazz2matches - all classes with the depending matches (if paths are defined, the names must match against the MX name; otherwise the found files must match)
_clazz2matchesOpp - all classes and the depending matches for the files which must be excluded from the matches defined in _class2matched
Returns:
map of update classes and the depending files with their names
Throws:
Exception - if match for the files failed
See Also:
PARAM_IGNOREFILE, PARAM_IGNOREPATH, PARAM_PATH

getAllFiles

protected Set<File> getAllFiles(File _path,
                                Collection<String> _ignorePaths,
                                Collection<String> _ignoreFiles)
Evaluates depending on given path all files in the sub directories.

Parameters:
_path - path for which the files are searched
_ignorePaths - match for ignored paths for which files are not returned
_ignoreFiles - match for ignored files which are not returned
Returns:
set of all found files TODO performance improvement needed if for given path already all files are evaluated

getMatching

protected Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,Set<String>> getMatching(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                                                     Map<Collection<TypeDef_mxJPO>,List<String>> _clazz2matches,
                                                     Map<TypeDef_mxJPO,List<String>> _clazz2matchesOpp)
                                              throws Exception
Evaluate all matching administration objects within MX.

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_clazz2matches - map of update classes and the depending list of string which must match
_clazz2matchesOpp - map of update classes and the depending list of match string of MX names which must be excluded
Returns:
map of classes and a set of matching names for this classes
Throws:
Exception - if the match fails
See Also:
export(ParameterCache_mxJPO, Map, Map), delete(ParameterCache_mxJPO, Map, Map)
